long_description: The REI 50-watt Transformer allows you to use your 110-volt electronic devices in countries operating on 220 volts. For use with 110-volt appliances up to 50 watts; transformer reduces 220 volts to 110 volts. 2-pin plug fits most European outlets. Includes a travel pouch. Features an auto-reset fuse. Not for continuous use.
short_description: The REI 50-watt Transformer allows you to use your 110-volt electronic devices in countries operating on 220 volts.
